rmk: A one-noted call between 2000-5000 Hz that sounds like a "dze", heard at 00:00, presumably an alarm or contact call by the Savanna Nightjar.

Recording was made using iPhone 6 and has been uploaded without any editing or cleaning up. The recording has the call of the closest bird followed by the duetting call of a second bird (low) that was at a distance.
